Subroutine vom_add_hourly

1341 : 
1342 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1343 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1344 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1345 : 
1346 :       subroutine vom_add_hourly ()
1347 :       use vegwatmod
1348 :       use vegmod
1349 :       use watmod
1350 :       implicit none
1351 : 
1352 :       REAL*8 :: ass__(3)
1353 :       REAL*8 :: assg__(3,3)
1354 : 
1355 :       ass__(:) = (4.d0 * ca_ * gstom__ + 8.d0 * gammastar * gstom__    &
1356 :      &         + jact_(:) - 4.d0 * rl__(:) - SQRT((-4.d0 * ca_ * gstom__ &
1357 :      &         + 8.d0 * gammastar * gstom__ + jact_(:) - 4.d0          &
1358 :      &         * rl__(:)) ** 2.d0 + 16.d0 * gammastar * gstom__        &
1359 :      &         * (8.d0 * ca_ * gstom__ + jact_(:) + 8.d0 * rl__(:)))) / 8.d0  ! (3.22) ; (Out[319])
1360 :       hass_(:) = hass_(:) + ass__(:) * dt_
1361 :       assg__(:,:) = (4.d0 * ca_ * gstomg__(:,:) + 8.d0 * gammastar     &
1362 :      &            * gstomg__(:,:) + jactg(:,:) - 4.d0 * rlg__(:,:)     &
1363 :      &            - SQRT((-4.d0 * ca_ * gstomg__(:,:) + 8.d0 * gammastar &
1364 :      &            * gstomg__(:,:) + jactg(:,:) - 4.d0 * rlg__(:,:))    &
1365 :      &            ** 2.d0 + 16.d0 * gammastar * gstomg__(:,:) * (8.d0  &
1366 :      &            * ca_ * gstomg__(:,:) + jactg(:,:) + 8.d0 * rlg__(:,:)))) / 8.d0  ! (3.22); (Out[319])
1367 :       hassg(:,:) = hassg(:,:) + assg__(:,:) * dt_
1368 :       hruptkvec(:) = hruptkvec(:) + ruptkvec(:) * dt_
1369 :       hruptkg(:) = hruptkg(:) + ruptkg(:) * dt_
1370 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
1371 :         hspgfcf = hspgfcf + dt_ * spgfcf__
1372 :         hinfx   = hinfx   + dt_ * infx__
1373 :         hio     = hio     + dt_ * io_
1374 :         hesoil  = hesoil  + dt_ * esoil__
1375 :         hetm_   = hetm_   + dt_ * etm__
1376 :         hetmg   = hetmg   + dt_ * etmg__(2,2) 
1377 :         hruptk_ = hruptk_ + dt_ * SUM(ruptkvec(:))
1378 :         hinf_   = hinf_   + dt_ * inf_
1379 :       endif
1380 : 
1381 :       return
1382 :       end subroutine vom_add_hourly
